verses.verse: We have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears, <S%H241><s%> God; <S%H430><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> have told <S%H5608><s%> us, <S%H6467><s%> what work you did <S%H6466><s%> in their days, <S%H3117><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H6924><s%>

You drove out <S%H3423><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> with your hand, <S%H3027><s%> but you planted <S%H5193><s%> them. <S%H7489><s%> You afflicted the peoples, <S%H3816><s%> but you spread them abroad. <S%H7971><s%>

For they didn't <S%H3423><s%> get the land <S%H776><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%> by their own sword, <S%H2719><s%> neither did their own arm <S%H2220><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> them; <S%H3225><s%> but your right hand, and your arm, <S%H2220><s%> and the light <S%H216><s%> of your face, <S%H6440><s%> because you were favorable to them. <S%H7521><s%>
You are my King, <S%H4428><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Command <S%H6680><s%> victories <S%H3444><s%> for Jacob! <S%H3290><s%>
Through you, <S%H5055><s%> will we push down our adversaries. <S%H6862><s%> Through your name, <S%H8034><s%> will we tread them under <S%H947><s%> who rise up against us. <S%H6965><s%>
For I will not trust <S%H982><s%> in my bow, <S%H7198><s%> neither shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> save me. <S%H3467><s%>
But you have saved <S%H3467><s%> us from our adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and have shamed <S%H954><s%> those who hate us. <S%H8130><s%>
In God <S%H430><s%> we have made our boast <S%H1984><s%> all day <S%H3117><s%> long, <S%H3034><s%> we will give thanks to your name <S%H8034><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But <S%H637><s%> now you rejected <S%H2186><s%> us, <S%H3637><s%> and brought us to dishonor, and don't <S%H3318><s%> go out with our armies. <S%H6635><s%>
You make us turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> from the adversary. <S%H6862><s%> Those who hate <S%H8130><s%> us take spoil for themselves. <S%H8154><s%>
You have made <S%H5414><s%> us like sheep <S%H6629><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> and have scattered <S%H2219><s%> us among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
You sell <S%H4376><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> for nothing, <S%H1952><s%> and have gained nothing <S%H1952><s%> from their sale. <S%H4242><s%>
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> a scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and a derision <S%H7047><s%> to those who are around us. <S%H5439><s%>
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a byword <S%H4912><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> a shaking <S%H4493><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> among the peoples. <S%H3816><s%>
All <S%H3117><s%> day long my dishonor <S%H1322><s%> is before me, <S%H1322><s%> and shame covers <S%H3680><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%>
At the taunt <S%H6963><s%> of one who reproaches <S%H2778><s%> and verbally abuses, <S%H1442><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger. <S%H5358><s%>
All this has come <S%H935><s%> on us, <S%H7911><s%> yet have we not forgotten you, <S%H8266><s%> Neither have we been false to your covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
Our heart <S%H3820><s%> has not turned <S%H5472><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> neither have our steps <S%H838><s%> strayed <S%H5186><s%> from your path, <S%H734><s%>
Though you have crushed <S%H1794><s%> us in the haunt <S%H4725><s%> of jackals, <S%H8577><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> us with the shadow of death. <S%H6757><s%>
If we have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> or spread forth <S%H6566><s%> our hands <S%H3709><s%> to a strange <S%H2114><s%> god; <S%H410><s%>
won't <S%H430><s%> God search this out? <S%H2713><s%> For he knows <S%H3045><s%> the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of the heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Yes, <S%H2026><s%> for your sake we are killed all day <S%H3117><s%> long. <S%H2803><s%> We are regarded as sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter. <S%H2878><s%>
Wake <S%H5782><s%> up! <S%H3462><s%> Why do you sleep, Lord? <S%H136><s%> Arise! <S%H6974><s%> Don't <S%H2186><s%> reject us forever. <S%H5331><s%>
Why do you hide <S%H5641><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> and forget <S%H7911><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression? <S%H3906><s%>
For our soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down <S%H7743><s%> to the dust. <S%H6083><s%> Our body <S%H990><s%> clings <S%H1692><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Rise <S%H6965><s%> up to help <S%H5833><s%> us. <S%H6299><s%> Redeem us for your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
